mapper.sql: id, user_id, user_name, ip_list, is_del, system_type, create_user, create_ip, create_time, update_user, update_ip, update_time, description
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM tb_ip_white_list WHERE id = #{id, jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_ip_white_list SET user_id = #{user_id, jdbcType=INTEGER}, user_name = #{user_name, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ip_list = #{ip_list, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_del = #{is_del, jdbcType=INTEGER}, system_type = #{system_type, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_user = #{create_user, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_ip = #{create_ip, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{create_time, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_user = #{update_user, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_ip = #{update_ip, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{update_time, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, description = #{description, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT FROM tb_ip_white_list WHERE id = #{id, jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT
FROM tb_ip_white_list WHERE system_type = #{system_type, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND user_id = #{user_id, jdbcType=INTEGER} AND ip_list = #{ip_list, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND is_del = 0
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_ip_white_list SET is_del = 1 WHERE system_type = #{system_type, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND user_id = #{user_id, jdbcType=INTEGER}
UPDATE tb_ip_white_list SET is_del = 1 WHERE system_type = #{system_type, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND user_id = #{user_id, jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT FROM tb_ip_white_list WHERE system_type = #{system_type, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND is_del = 0 AND user_id IN #{id, jdbcType=INTEGER} GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY create_time DESC
